title: Constant Disconnections from Alpha Client, From Champion Select to In-Game Sinces Recent Update.
body: Really annoying, Champion Select Disconnects Me from Starting a Game, Took Multiple Retries to Get In. Then I randomly disconnect from the game half way through and could not reconnect, I had to exit the client multiple times in order to connect.

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some serious connection issue specifically reaching the game server.  I recommend doing any troubleshooting from this point in a custom game to prevent any leaves.  To start, going through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) can help towards getting the problem resolved.  Let me know how that works out for you!

Not a connection issue, League has been working fine for the past 7 years, including the past year with no connection problems. My internet is working fine. For example, I am running a multiple monitor setup, so I have multiple videos, news pages, and etc up with League loading. If all those connections are working fine, I do not believe it is a connection issue.

Also, I am not the only person with this game, many of my friends using the new client are also experiencing this problem and having to reconnect to the game.
